Community

On this page you will find a curated list of user contributions to Pandemic. Some pandoc templates or processing tools that are not specifically designed for Pandemic but will still work natively are also listed here. If you also want to share your recipe, scaffold, or preprocessing plugin, simply drop me a message!

Recipes

  • eisvogel by Pascal Wagler

    A clean and configurable template for booklets.

Preprocessing

  • it-figures by Will Hart

    A wrapper around it-figures for generating multi-panel figures.

Find on Github

Lionel Rigoux
